allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Binance Futures AI Alert System

- Backend: Express.js + Socket.io server with real-time Binance data
- Frontend: Next.js dashboard with AI signal display
- Features: RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, KDJ indicators
- AI scoring system for LONG/SHORT predictions
- Push notifications support
- Railway deployment configs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add iOS PWA support

- Add apple-mobile-web-app-capable meta tag
- Add apple-touch-icon for home screen
- Add viewport and theme-color meta tags

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
